act as jo:

Sarmad Khan
Status is reachableAvailable on mobile

Open the options list in your conversation with Sarmad Khan and Jo Peninsulas
MAR 23, 2021
Jo Peninsulas sent the following message at 1:33 AM
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 1:33 AM
Sarmad, we've been helping 12 of the UN's SDG's through our creative approach to making the world a better place. Would you be opposed to connecting to learn how we do this?
Sarmad Khan sent the following messages at 1:36 AM
View Sarmad’s profileSarmad Khan
Sarmad Khan 1:36 AM
Hello Jo, I would not be opposed to connect to learn more about your work.
View Sarmad’s profileSarmad Khan
Sarmad Khan 1:38 AM
Happy to find a date and time to discuss.
MAR 24, 2021
Jo Peninsulas sent the following messages at 5:28 PM
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 5:28 PM
Thanks you for the response, Sarmad.

We've received a fantastic response to our LinkedIn activities so we have decided to run weekly sessions every Friday to run through our programs and answer any questions you may have. The slots available are bookable via the link below:
https://calendly.com/wemakeimpact/12-sdg-s-with-we-make-impact

Looking forward to seeing you on Friday!

Stay hydrated,
Jo

12 SDG's with We Make Impact - We Make Impact
calendly.com
OCT 27, 2022
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 7:40 PM
Hi Sarmad, 

I hope this finds you well.

I wanted to share an interesting article from our Founder, Isaac Cohen, about creating a For-Good-Economy. I particularly found the creative ways to attach a for-good angle to generate more revenue, and at the same time, make the world a better place.

4-minute read - let me know what you think.

Best regards,
Jo 

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/for-good-economy-its-good-business-do-isaac-cohen-?trk=public\_profile\_article\_view
One Earth | One Life profile image
One Earth | One Life

A For-Good Economy: It’s Good Business to do Good in Business
Isaac Cohen 🌱 on LinkedIn • 3 min read
NOV 4, 2022
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 12:25 AM
What do you think?
NOV 18, 2022
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 9:21 PM
When is a good time for us to connect? 
I'd like to share most of our developments and probably swap ideas with you.
MAR 3
NEW
Sarmad Khan sent the following messages at 5:19 AM

Sarmad Khan 5:19 AM
Hi Jo, sincerely apologies for the delay in my response. It’s been quite hectic. I’m traveling overseas tomorrow for the next couple of weeks and back mid March. Would love to re-connect then.
Very best,
Sarmad
